chapter_description: Talks about my experiences with sports (mainly running) and other outdoor adventures.

A set of lists I have compiled. They don't generally talk about anything particularly deep or important, but I like to keep them, and I think they're fun to peruse. :)
Kartoffel (potato) is one of the first german words I learned, and its still one of my favourites. This section chronicles my adventures in moving to Germany.
